I like to sing karok.
I am allergic to dogs.
I went into the army after high school.
My mother was not part of my life.

participant_2.background:
My favorite holiday is christmas.
I love watching football on sundays.
I am a hair stylist.
My favorite food is cheese pizza.

content.text: I'm glad you like Christmas. I love it too! What's your favorite part of the holiday season?

I love spending time with my family and friends. We usually go to a Christmas tree farm and pick out a tree, then we decorate it together. We also go to church on Christmas Eve and open presents on Christmas morning.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to Christmas tree farms too. It's always so magical.
It is! I love the smell of the pine trees and the fresh air.
Me too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, go shopping, and hang out with my friends. I also like to play video games and watch TV.
That sounds like me! I like doing all of those things too. I love going to the movies and watching TV.
Me too! I love watching movies and TV shows. I'm always looking for new things to watch.
I know what you mean! I'm always looking for new movies and TV shows to watch too.
So, what are some of your favorite movies and TV shows?
I love watching action movies and comedies. I also like watching drama and horror movies. Some of my favorite TV shows are Friends, The Office, and Game of Thrones.
I love all of those shows too! I'm a big fan of The Office and Friends.
Me too! They're so funny.
Yeah, they are! I also love Game of Thrones. It's so epic.
I know what you mean! It's so good.
So, what do you like to do for work?
I'm a hair stylist. I love working with hair and making people look beautiful.
That sounds like a fun job! I'm a teacher. I love working with kids and helping them learn.
I know what you mean! I love working with kids too. They're so funny and cute.
Yeah, they are! I'm glad you're a teacher.
Me too! I love my job.
I'm glad to hear that!
